content.html: Childfree. (I have 3. Children are the best if you want children. I adore mine. But it’s like jumpers. If you’re not cold and someone makes you wear a jumper, it’s fucking hideous. If you are cold, it’s perfect. How do we understand this about knitware but not kids?)
content.value: Childfree. (I have 3. Children are the best if you want children. I adore mine.  But it’s like jumpers. If you’re not cold and someone makes you wear a jumper, it’s fucking hideous. If you are cold, it’s perfect. How do we understand this about knitware but not kids?)
